title: Drought destroys peanut crop, TR increases

content.prompt: If a severe drought destroys a significant portion of the peanut crop and peanut farmers' revenues increase, which of the following is true over the observed range of prices?

choices.label: The demand for peanuts must be unit elastic.
The demand for peanuts must be price elastic.
The demand for peanuts must be price inelastic.
The supply of peanuts must be price inelastic.
The supply of peanuts must be price elastic.
